basic_info.description: Finding solutions to people's problems is what I do. I am a software engineer who has a passion for continual learning and improvement. I value both efficiency and a positive user-experience and am always willing to explore new methods, practices, and ideas to ensure these two conditions are met. In past work and personal experiences I have come to witness how technology can greatly improve systems and processes no matter how simple or complex. At the core, this is what keeps me coming back - the ability to help people. I understand the impact and power of technology and feel strongly about making it more accessible. How can I help you with the power of tech?

projects.title: FlickList
projects.description: A fullstack, CRUD movie list web application. Keep a personalized list of movies recommended to you. Additionally, find information such as summaries and ratings for movies added via connection to a movie database API.

projects.title: Treatmeals
projects.description: Fullstack application made to support a community of users who follow the IIFYM, If It Fits Your Macros, fitness lifestyle. This app will allow users to find and share nutritional information from their favorite restaurants, so they can plan and always fit in some fun foods that align with their macronutrient goals.

projects.title: Boozgle
projects.description: One of the first apps I created after learning about harnessing the power of APIs! This application will allow the user to find a list of suggested cocktails from an alcoholic ingredient entry (i.e. wine)

projects.title: Recipe Gen
projects.description: This application will allow the user to find recipes to make based on any ingredient entered. Ingredients, instructions, and a link to a relevant YouTube video will also be generated for each recipe. This was completed using a food database API.

experience.company: We will have a conversation to outline the details and understand your vision for the project
experience.title: Consultation

experience.company: Based on our conversation, a detailed project proposal will be presented
experience.title: Proposal

experience.company: Your vision is in the works! Clients will receive regular updates as their project is created and tested
experience.title: Build

experience.company: The final product is delivered to the client
experience.title: Launch
